answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Katie, 
Here is a previously answered question that discusses security measures taken at city hall and electonic door locks are one of the measures discussed. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/questions/question/20558
I hope you find this informative and that other local  government officials are able to weigh in about the security measures that they take.  
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Katie Killen
text:
Does anyone have a policy to share regarding which situations you install EDLs with a card reader system vs. staying with a standard key system? 
We are looking at expanding our use of EDLs and want to have some kind of policy in place regarding when their use is warranted. 
Thanks.
title: Electronic Door Locks (EDLs) vs. Standard Keys
